member.name: M:FCQRS.Serialization.decodeFromBytes``1(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Deserializes a byte array to a strongly-typed object.
member.param: The byte array containing JSON data.
member.exception: Thrown when the deserialized value is null.

member.name: M:FCQRS.Serialization.encodeToBytes``1(``0)
member.summary: Serializes an object to a UTF-8 byte array.
member.returns: A byte array containing the JSON representation of the object.

member.name: M:FCQRS.Serialization.decode``1(System.Text.Json.JsonElement)
member.summary: Deserializes a JSON element to a strongly-typed object.
member.exception: Thrown when the deserialized value is null.

member.name: M:FCQRS.Serialization.encode``1(``0)
member.summary: Serializes an object to a JSON string.
member.returns: A JSON string representation of the object.

member.name: P:FCQRS.Serialization.jsonOptions
member.summary: Default JSON serializer options configured for F# types.

member.name: T:FCQRS.Serialization
member.summary: Provides JSON serialization and deserialization functionality for FCQRS.
